summary: This is a cover email from attorney Christian Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP transmitting a confidential letter to the government regarding discovery in the Epstein case. The email includes confidentiality and privacy notices.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP who sent the email transmitting a confidential letter to the government regarding discovery in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian Everdell sent a confidential letter to the government regarding discovery on October 2, 2020.
The communication is from Cohen & Gresser LLP, a law firm involved in the Epstein case.
The email contains strict confidentiality and privacy notices regarding the attached letter.
The attached PDF file is titled '2020.10.1_Letter to_Government_re_Discovery.PDF' indicating it concerns discovery matters.
